scripts._install: echo "### Run Gatrix _install command. ###" && gatrix install
scripts.prepare: echo "### Run Gatrix prepare command. ###" && npm run _local_install -- node_modules/gatrix
scripts._local_install: echo "### Run Gatrix _local_install command. ###" && npx gatrix install
scripts.devinstall: echo "### Run Gatrix devinstall command. ###" && npm run _install -- node_modules/gatrix
